text: This chapter modifies, limits, and supersedes the Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, approved June 30, 2000 (114 Stat. 464; 15 U.S.C. § 7001 et seq.), but does not modify, limit, or supersede section 101(c) of that act (15 U.S.C. § 7001(c)) or authorize electronic delivery of any of the notices described in section 103(b) of that act (15 U. S.C. § 7003(b)).
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 17-270, see notes following § 21-2401.01.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon § 502 of the Uniform Adult Guardianship and Protective Proceedings Jurisdiction Act. See Vol. 8A, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 21-2405.02

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Fiduciary Relations and Persons with Mental Illness. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Adult Guardianship and Protective Proceedings Jurisdiction; Uniform Act. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Relation to Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act.
